<!-- beginCustomHeader -->

## Description

Ride an entity
<!-- beginCustomDescription -->
<!-- endCustomDescription -->

## Properties

* maxTicks

  * Type: int
  * Default: 200

  Maximum ticks riding

* cooldown

  * Type: long
  * Default: 20

  Cooldown of the power, in ticks.

* maxDistance

  * Type: int
  * Default: 5

  Maximum distance to ride

* selectors

  * Type: Set<String>

  Selectors for this power.
